relevant_communication:
1) The official launching of the NBFI Employers’ Organization (PCIFN) - november 2016 
2) NBFI Employers’ Organization (PCIFN) Code of Best Practice in payday loan - text proposal and public acknowledgement by our company. 
3) Compliance with the Competition Directive - yearly event for the Competition Council and financial organizations, dedicated to journalists' training (2011-2016) 
4) Launching and promoting on yearly bases the event "The Financial Consumer Day" in cooperation with the Consumer Protection Authority. 
5) 2006 - 2017 Annual Yearbook of non-banking financial market; yearly report on financial leasing market published by the "World Leasing Yearbook" - www.world-leasing-yearbook.com 
6) Harmonization of  DIRECTIVE 2014/17/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL 
of 4 February 2014 on credit agreements for consumers relating to residential immovable property and amending 
Directives 2008/48/EC and 2013/36/EU and Regulation (EU) No 1093/2010  in direct cooperation with Romanian Government - Consumer Protection Authority, representing the Credit Employers' Patronate - PCIFN 
7) Harmonizing the European Banking Authority Guide on principles of employee's remuneration for Credit Employers' Patronate - PCIFN and responsbile lending principles  
8) issuing periodical Newsletter informing our clients on the EU roadmap and inviting them to react and send opinions
